00043 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT        2
00044 
00045 /***************************************************************************/
00048 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT          4
00049 
00050 /***************************************************************************/
00053 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT        1
00054 //There are no any attributes at the client side
00055 
00056 /***************************************************************************/
00059 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT          2
00060 
00061 //Atribute Ids of alarm Information Attribute Set at the server side
00063 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_ALARM_COUNT_ATTRIBUTE_ID               CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00064 
00065 //Attribute Ids of Basic Cluster Information
00066 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                          CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00067 
00069 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALARM_COMMAND_ID        0x00
00070 
00071 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALL_ALARMS_COMMAND_ID   0x01
00072 
00073 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_GET_ALARM_COMMAND_ID          0x02
00074 
00075 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALARM_LOG_COMMAND_ID    0x03
00076 
00078 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ALARM_COMMAND_ID                0x00
00079 
00080 #define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_GET_ALARM_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID   0x01

00100   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID) \
00101 
00102 #define ZCL_DEFINE_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \

00108 #define ZCL_DEFINE_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS(resetAlarmCommandInd, resetAllAlarmsCommandInd, getAlarmCommandInd, \
00109                                           resetAlarmLogCommandInd) \
00110     DEFINE_COMMAND(resetAlarm, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALARM_COMMAND_ID,  \
00111                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),  \
00112                      resetAlarmCommandInd), \
00113     DEFINE_COMMAND(resetAllAlarms, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALL_ALARMS_COMMAND_ID,                    \
00114                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00115                      resetAllAlarmsCommandInd), \
00116     DEFINE_COMMAND(getAlarm, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_GET_ALARM_COMMAND_ID,                                 \
00117                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00118                      getAlarmCommandInd), \
00119     DEFINE_COMMAND(resetAlarmLog, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALARM_LOG_COMMAND_ID,             \
00120                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00121                      resetAlarmLogCommandInd)
00122 
00123 #define ZCL_DEFINE_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS(alarmCommandInd, getAlarmResponseCommandInd) \

00151 #define ALARMS_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)                      \
00152   {                                                                                           \
00153     .id = ALARMS_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                  \
00154     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},\
00155     .attributesAmount = ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                          \
00156     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                   \
00157     .commandsAmount = ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                              \
00158     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands                                                         \
00159   }
00160 
00161 #define ZCL_DEFINE_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_FLASH(clattributes) ALARMS_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes)
00162 /***************************************************************************/
00177 #define ALARMS_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)                      \
00178   {                                                                                           \
00179     .id = ALARMS_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                  \
00180     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},\
00181     .attributesAmount = ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                          \
00182     .attributes = NULL,                                                                       \
00183     .commandsAmount = ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                              \
00184     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands                                                         \
00185   }
00186 
00187 #define DEFINE_ALARMS_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00188     ALARMS_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00189 
00190 #define ZCL_DEFINE_ALARMS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_FLASH() ALARMS_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE()

00196 typedef struct PACK

00199 
00205   struct PACK
00206   {
00207     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00208     uint8_t             type;         
00209     uint8_t             properties;   
00210     uint16_t             value;        
00211   } alarmCount;
00212 
00213   struct PACK
00214   {
00215     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00216     uint8_t type;
00217     uint8_t properties;
00218     uint16_t value;
00219   } clusterVersion;
00220 
00222 } ZCL_AlarmsClusterServerAttributes_t;
